extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: Examination of historical research methods using primarily non-printed sources, with emphasis on material culture and its application to community history. Students will examine the use of photographs, ephemera, artifacts, oral history, popular music, movies, magazines and posters to consider how these sources can augment written documentation.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: History Outside the Book
